title: 59" White Oval Acrylic Free Standing Soaking Bathtub
description: Luxury at your fingertips. This 59 inch ALFI brand free standing acrylic soaking tub offers both versatility and elegance. With just the right blend of functionality and aesthetics, this tub is sure to compliment a variety of bathroom styles and will transform your everyday routine into a spa like escape. Additional information FEATURE 1 Deeper than standard tubs for full immersion. FEATURE 2 Unlike traditional enamel/steel tubs, acrylic tubs are warmer to the touch and provide a more comfortable soaking experience. FEATURE 3 This tub requires that you purchase a floor mounted or wall mounted tub filler. No faucets or predrilled holes included. FEATURE 4 Free standing tub. Can be insalled anywhere with a floor drain outlet. FEATURE 5 Built in polished chrome overflow. FEATURE 6 Includes polished chrome pop-up drain. FEATURE 7 Made of acrylic material on a concealed stainless steel base with adjustable legs for accurate leveling, stability, and support. FEATURE 8 Note - All measurements are ± 1/2 in. FEATURE 9 Certified by Uniform Plumbing Code (cUPC). MATERIAL Acrylic LENGTH 59 WIDTH 28 HEIGHT 22 7/8 INSTALLATION TYPE Free Standing SHAPE Oval DEPTH 17 3/4 INNER SIZE 33 7/8 x 15 3/4 OVERFLOW? Yes HEIGHT TO OVERFLOW 15 3/8 DRAIN PLACEMENT Rear Center DRAIN SIZE 2 NUMBER OF JETS 0 LIGHTING? No THEME Modern WATER CAPACITY 48 FAUCET HOLES 0 COLOR White

title: White Rectangular Solid Surface Smooth Resin Soaking Bathtub
description: Spa inspired bathtubs such as the ALFI brand AB9952 free standing resin soaking tubs, have become a popular choice for individuals looking to add a sculptural element to their bathroom décor. These tubs do not include features such as jets or bubbles, letting you enjoy a deep quiet soak, just like old times. While relatively new to the market, solid surface resin tubs retain heat well, and come in a variety of shapes and sizes, making them a great choice for easily adding a touch of sophisticated elegance with spa like appeal. Additional information FEATURE 1 This tub requires that you purchase a floor mounted or wall mounted tub filler. No faucets or predrilled holes included. FEATURE 2 Made of smooth resin composite material with a matte finish. FEATURE 3 Built in overflow. FEATURE 4 Includes concealed matte matching pop-up drain. FEATURE 5 Free standing tub. Can be installed anywhere with a floor drain outlet. FEATURE 6 The durable surface of this tub makes it extremely resilient to scratches and stains. However, if any imperfection occurs, it can easily be removed using extra fine sanding paper. FEATURE 7 Certified by Uniform Plumbing Code (cUPC). FEATURE 8 1 year warranty against manufacturing defects. MATERIAL Resin LENGTH 67 3/4 WIDTH 31 1/4 HEIGHT 23 1/4 INSTALLATION TYPE Free Standing SHAPE Rectangular DEPTH 17 INNER SIZE 55 1/4 x 19 1/2 OVERFLOW? Yes HEIGHT TO OVERFLOW 17 DRAIN PLACEMENT Center DRAIN SIZE 2 LIGHTING? No WATER CAPACITY 74 FAUCET HOLES 0 COLOR Matte White

title: Sliding Rail Hand Shower Set
description: Enjoy the simple pleasure of a great shower with the elegant and modern ALFI brand Sliding Rail Hand Shower Set. It combines both the style and functionality that you expect from our products. Comes in three different finishes, Black Matte, Polished Chrome, and Brushed Nickel to accommodate different bathroom decors. With adjustable heights, even your little ones will enjoy a shower that is truly customized to their needs. Additional Information FEATURE 1 Enjoy the benefits of a handheld shower head by adding this set to your shower. It comes with a showerhead, hose, and a sliding rail for adjustable height. FEATURE 2 Comes with a matching square wall union for shower hose installation. This item mounts on the wall and allows the shower hose to easily connect. FEATURE 3 Solid brass construction coated with a Polished Chrome or Brushed Nickel finish. FEATURE 4 Sleek modern design. FEATURE 5 This unit does not include the valves needed to direct water into the showerhead, a mixer or shower valves must be purchased separately. For those interested in incorporating an above shower head and/or tub filler, a mixer that includes a diverter unit must be purchased. For those interested in a handheld shower experience only, shower valves or a mixer must be purchased. FEATURE 6 UPC logo of authenticity etched on the unit. FEATURE 7 Features a backflow preventer check valve to ensure that water cannot flow back into the plumbing through the shower head.​ CHILD SKUS AB7606-PC, AB7606-BN, AB7606-BM MATERIAL Brass LENGTH 26 3/4 THEME Modern SHOWER HEAD FUNCTION Single Function FLOW RATE (GPM) 2.5 INCLUDES HANDHELD? Yes INCLUDES SLIDE BAR? Yes LIGHTING? No

title: 3-Way Thermostatic Valve Shower Mixer Square Knobs Matte Black
description: Modern square knobs and a sleek appearance make this easy-to-install single-panel shower mixer a perfect choice. Equipped with a 3-way shower diverter, this brass thermostatic shower valve mixer by ALFI brand lets you switch from your handheld shower head or above shower head to tub filler or body jets any time you wish. It comes in three stylish finishes to accommodate your bathroom style, Black Matte, Polished Chrome, and Brushed Nickel. Additional Information FEATURE 1 Solid brass construction coated with a Polished Chrome or Brushed Nickel finish. FEATURE 2 A 3-way diverter is typically used for an above showerhead, a hand-held showerhead, and the third for either a tub filler or body jets. If you only need 2-ways, your plumber can easily cap the third pipe to cancel it out. FEATURE 3 A thermostatic valve allows you to have separate temperature and pressure controls, allowing you to leave the water at a certain temperature and turn your water on and off separately. FEATURE 4 Three square knobs from top to bottom: Water Diverter, Temperature Control, and On/Off Control. FEATURE 5 Sleek modern design FEATURE 6 Single panel design makes it a breeze to install on any surface. FEATURE 7 Certified by Uniform Plumbing Code (cUPC). UPC logo of authenticity etched on the unit. FEATURE 8 Shower options and Hot & Cold functions etched on the plate FEATURE 9 Includes both the trim and the rough-in valve, so it has everything needed to function. FEATURE 10 The Diverter knob can be positioned halfway between outlets, giving you the opportunity to indulge in two shower experiences simultaneously. UPC logo of authenticity etched on unit CHILD SKUS AB2801-BN, AB2801-PC, AB2801-BM MATERIAL Brass INSTALLATION TYPE Wall Mount INCLUDES HANDHELD? No THERMOSTATIC? Yes VALVE TYPE Ceramic Disc Cartridge HANDLE TYPE Knob NUMBER OF HANDLES 3 INCLUDES DIVERTER? Yes INCLUDES TUB FILLER? No FLOW RATE (GPM) 2.5 THEME Modern HEIGHT 12 5/8

title: 2 Inch Square Adjustable Shower Body Jet
description: Transform your shower with this ALFI brand AB3820 2 Inch Square Adjustable Shower Body Spray. Install as many or as few as your heart desires, and indulge in a spa-like adventure in the comfort of your own home. Give yourself the joy of an invigorating and fully refreshing shower experience and you’ll never go back to the ordinary again. Additional Information FEATURE 1 Made of brass and coated in a brushed nickel finish. FEATURE 2 Modern square design. FEATURE 3 Wall-mounted installation. FEATURE 4 Easy to clean spray face. FEATURE 5 Certified by Uniform Plumbing Code (cUPC). CHILD SKUS AB3820-BN, AB3820-PC, AB3820-BM MATERIAL Brass REQUIRED HOLES 1 FLOW RATE (GPM) 2.2

title: 20" Square Ultra Thin Rain Shower Head Stainless Steel
description: Transform your bathroom with this large 20-inch ULTRA THIN square rain shower head. You won't believe your eyes and neither will your next house guest. Enjoy the modern sleek thin design and be reassured that it's made of solid stainless steel unlike traditional rain shower heads made of brass. Additional Information FEATURE 1 The entire shower head body is made of solid stainless steel! FEATURE 2 The polished Stainless Steel finish is just like Chrome and features a mirrored look. FEATURE 3 The brushed Stainless Steel finish looks like Brushed Nickel and will not hold fingerprint marks as easily as the mirrored finishes. FEATURE 4 Square shape, 20" sides, and only 2mm thick. FEATURE 5 Does not include a female/female adapter, includes a flexible water supply line, and water supply connects in the center. No need to purchase the shower arm separately. FEATURE 6 Clear rubber nozzles allow for easy cleaning if clogged by debris. Comes with 5 replacement nozzles. FEATURE 7 Due to the size of this unit, we recommend ceiling installation only. FEATURE 8 Modern Stylish Design. Polished or Brushed Stainless Steel finish, made to match or stand out from your other bathroom fixtures. FEATURE 9 Comes with arms that support it to the ceiling from each corner. CHILD SKUS RAIN20S-PSS, RAIN20S-BSS, RAIN20S-BM MATERIAL Stainless Steel SHAPE Square WIDTH 20 LENGTH 20 THEME Modern SHOWER HEAD FUNCTION Rain FLOW RATE (GPM) 1.8 INCLUDES HANDHELD? No INCLUDES SLIDE BAR? No LIGHTING? No

title: Single Lever Bath Shower Valve Diverter
description: This single lever easy-to-install shower mixer by ALFI brand will transform any bathroom design from bland to glam. Equipped with a shower diverter, you can switch from your handheld shower head to the tub filler or above the shower head any time you wish. It comes in two stylish finishes to accommodate your bathroom style, polished chrome, and brushed nickel. Additional Information FEATURE 1 Solid brass construction coated with a Polished Chrome or Brushed Nickel finish. FEATURE 2 Single Lever control. FEATURE 3 Single Hole wall mount installation FEATURE 4 This shower mixer controls both the water temperature and pressure. The handle pulls up to control the pressure and left or right for hot & cold water. FEATURE 5 The pressure balance feature helps to maintain a consistent water temperature in response to changes in hot and cold water supply pressures. FEATURE 6 Certified by Uniform Plumbing Code (cUPC) FEATURE 7 H & C letters are etched on the plate to indicate the location of Hot & Cold water. FEATURE 8 Includes both the trim and the rough-in valve, so it has everything needed to function. FEATURE 9 UPC logo of authenticity etched on the unit. FEATURE 10 Sleek modern design. CHILD SKUS AB5601-BN, AB5601-PC, AB5601-BM MATERIAL Brass INSTALLATION TYPE Wall Mount INCLUDES HANDHELD? No THERMOSTATIC? title: Circular Shower Column with Dual Function Shower Head
description: With clean minimalist lines and exceptional ergonomics, this Circular shower system upgrades your bathroom to a spa-like shower system without modifying existing plumbing or breaking out tile. Retro Fit design makes it easy to replace without modifying existing plumbing. Solid Brass construction to resist rust, corrosion, and tarnish. 8” Rain Shower delivers exceptional water coverage Easily switch between the Rain shower and Hand shower by turning the diverter. With a 15.8″ long shower arm, it offers ample distance from the wall and makes your shower experience a joy. Premium quality cartridge provides long-lasting leak-free use, tested with 500,000 times life cycles. Handheld shower with 60″ stainless steel hose offers targeted spray and adds convenience for bathing children or pets. The hand shower holder can slide up and down, making it suitable for all people varying from the old to the young in different heights.

title: Kerdi-Drain 4in. Grate Brushed Nickel
description: Schluter®-KERDI-DRAIN is a shower drain with an integrated bonding flange that provides a large contact area for a secure connection to the KERDI waterproofing membrane at the top of the assembly.
